name: abc2 (balloon)
description:
Here's what you've all been waiting for.

♫♫♫

The music during the quiz is a nightcore remix of Boards of Canada's Everything You Do is a Balloon.

♫♫♫

The 1% 'Scrooge McDuck' fat cats at itch.io have hidden my most recent horror game "Radio Head", so check that out if you like this.

♫♫♫

Thanks for playing.
